document.full_text: israel said on sunday it would build several hundred homes for settlers in the occupied west bank, a day after a palestinian attack killed an israeli couple and three of their children in a settlement.
document.title: israel to build settler homes after palestinian attack
lines_and_colors: israel said on sunday it would build several hundred homes for settlers in the occupied west bank, a day after a palestinian attack killed an israeli couple and three of their children in a settlement.
